name: Millennium Runners
summary: The ultimate anti-gravity racing experience. Millennium Runners is an homage to classic arcade racing games. Speed through futuristic cities and planets in adrenaline-fueled competitions. Along the way, you'll discover hidden easter eggs and pick up an arsenal of power-ups — from rockets to mines and more — designed either to propel you to victory or to hinder your rivals. Choose your team, conquer the Millennium Cup, and race your way into legend!
